Title: SharePoint 2013 Starter Stylesheet
Description: This is a starter css to be used in the branding of a Sharepont 2013 publishing site, containing mainly the classes used for text styling.
HomeWiki:
Project Description


This project starts off as being a css file that skins the text of SharePoint 2013 publishing sites.
The css is designed to reveal the classes that your css needs to access the text content (ONLY!) of your site. The purpose of the project is to be a starting point of your own Sharepoint stylesheet, at least for the text branding part.

The css is commented so that you know which class(es) apply to which element/area of a SharePoint page.

Download the css if:
- you are working on branding a SharePoint 2013 site and need a css starting point
- you want to use a starter css that complies with best practices (aka not core.css)
